tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_light_fixture_data (
    fixture_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    sensor_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    light_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    energy_usage FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE smart_light_fixture_data (
  fixture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  energy_usage DECIMAL,
  light_intensity INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE lighting_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  days_of_week VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_optimization (
  optimization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  energy_saved DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SmartLightFixtures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fixture_name VARCHAR,
  location VARCHAR,
  energy_usage DECIMAL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fixture_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  brightness INT,
  temperature DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sensor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    light_intensity INT,
    energy_usage FLOAT
  )

CREATE TABLE fixtures (
    fixture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    model VARCHAR(50)
  )

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    cost DECIMAL(10,2)
  )

CREATE TABLE lighting_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    days_of_week VARCHAR(20)
  )

CREATE TABLE notification_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    fixture_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    notification_type VARCHAR(20),
    message TEXT
  )
